text: Arau se'i mahilajani te'omra prati asakta haichila arau teraom ta'ira prati asakta hai parailehemtena yadi te'om te'omra pratipalakara nidarsana nedekhilehemtena. E'idarae'i (seya haichila) yate ami te'omra paraa kukarma arau aslilata dura karai di'om. Niscaya te'om achila amara mukhalica ba bisud'dhacitta bandasakalara antarbhukta
